directory.name: src
directory.purpose: The `src` directory houses the source code for a React to-do list application, including components, custom hooks, type definitions, utility functions, and static assets.

subdirectories.name: assets
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\assets` directory stores the project's static assets, such as images or media files, used within the source code.

subdirectories.name: components
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\components` directory contains the source code for all React components of a to-do list application, including input, item display, filtering, and statistics.

subdirectories.name: hooks
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\hooks` directory contains the source code for custom React hooks used within a temporary project repository.

subdirectories.name: types
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\types` directory stores type definitions for a software project.

subdirectories.name: utils
subdirectories.sourcedPurposeFromChild: The `src\utils` directory contains utility functions and supporting code for a temporary project repository.
